attributes.action: Recall parliament for a national debate about our exit from the EU.
attributes.additional_details: The pound and the FTSE 100 index have both dropped several percentage points in a few hours.  Urgent action is needed.
attributes.background: The vote to leave the EU has created an unprecedented crisis within the country.  Parliament should be recalled to debate the way ahead in the next few weeks and months.

rejection.details:
Parliament is currently sitting, so it's not clear what action you want to see in addition to this. If you want Parliament to debate the referendum result, you can sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
